H0.text: If you were to fly due east out of Rio de Janeiro, which country's coastline would you fly over first. Angola

H1.text: If you were to fly due east out of Rio de Janeiro, which country's coastline would you fly over first. South Africa

H2.text: If you were to fly due east out of Rio de Janeiro, which country's coastline would you fly over first. Namibia

H3.text: If you were to fly due east out of Rio de Janeiro, which country's coastline would you fly over first. Nambam

A4.text: The nation's capital, Luanda, lies on the Atlantic coast in the northwest of the country.

A5.text: Angola has a favourable coastline for maritime trade, with four natural harbours: Luanda, Lobito, Moçâmedes, and Tômbua.
